title: jIva sEvai shiva
sahitya:
jIva sEvai shiva pUjaiyAkki sheivadE tavam manamE


anupallavi

  Avi uDalaik-kOvil enrE bhAvitt-anbu mEvi nALum


caraNam    uNDuDuttu nAgarIkamAi ulaga mAndar ottu vAzha vaNDu pOlat-tozhilgaL sheyya
vAimai jnAna oLi paravavE eNDisaiyum azhagum kalaiyum kaNDu nenjam kaLikka kaLikka
				(madhyamakAla)
EkattilE shuddha bhOgattilE Atma dAham taNinduyarvAga nilamellAm
